original_text: The sons of Benjamin according to their clans: of Bela, the clan of the Belaites; of Ashbel, the clan of the Ashbelites; of Ahiram, the clan of the Ahiramites;
korean_text: 베냐민 자손의 종족들은 이러하니 벨라에게서 난 벨라 종족과 아스벨에게서 난 아스벨 종족과 아히람에게서 난 아히람 종족과

sentences.original_text: The sons of Benjamin according to their clans:
of Bela, the clan of the Belaites;
of Ashbel, the clan of the Ashbelites;
of Ahiram, the clan of the Ahiramites;
